resources.string: Select the desired product for this session
Proactive communication with the customer of the maintenance plan or repair quotation
Overview of the condition of each unit and precise matching of technician and spare parts
Saving time and energy on micromanagement of technician job scheduling and dispatching
Improve communication and check in with customer
Enhanced customer satisfaction by tool simplification
Direct Access and Communication to Call Center
Faster Access to work story of the service equipment and with all supporting documentation
Check out the new KONE FSM app!
Make sure to read all the goals before proceeding

We understand that traveling and working on the equipment are the two most time consuming activities in a service visit. To aide with this, FSM will optimize travel path and focus on having all the right tools and parts to work on the equipment
Keep a spare in the truck

Would you rather spend your time working with equipment than spend it by planning your work, trying to remember what you needed to do next, or being stuck in traffic? Why not give a try at the new dispatching functionality, your personal pocket planner!

What is the one thing you have in your pocket at times? FSM will be widening the set of easy to use mobile features supporting you in your daily work, helping to execute tasks fast and provide excellent customer service. Technology is here to serve you, not the other way around!

When is the last time you have chased after a manual, circuit diagram, fault code list or specialist phone number, for completing troubleshooting or fixing and issue? You might be delighted to hear that all this information could be now found in one place, accessible through your mobile phone.

Think about a first visit to the site when you have never gone before. What if someone had collected and offered to your disposal all the service contract details, service history and customer special requests? For this we are connecting our call centers with a completely new way of delivering information.
All maintenance work – no matter if planned of unplanned – will be automatically scheduled. Dynamic assignments will make it easy toknow where you need to be next.
Location can be used to group scheduled visits to reduce travel time leaving more time for the actual value adding work.
Dynamic dispatching ensures that planned service is scheduled only when spare parts are available for completing the job.
Access to all customer and contract data
Auto prioritized daily site visit list
Access to all instructions for focusing preventive maintenance and troubleshooting actions to right components
Who can FSM Field Mobility Benefit?
Reliable work list and on-time service
Fastest and most quality service for Customer Loyality
No questionmarks for us and the customers and this means we build trust together
How do you look up the basic information and maintenance history of the equipment?
Incomplete or out of date information and data?
Do not know what is the maintenance contract required?
How do you like FMS tells you where to go next, and your daily task list is constantly updated and prioritized?
How do you like FMT recommends completing additional jobs on the site, if they are within the scheduling horizon?
How do you like FMS tells you customer’s expectations and his contract coverage for this job?
How do you like to see the full service history and what parts have been replaced?
How do you like to see in FMT, if you have the parts in your car. If not, you can easily order them. For planned jobs, system will ensure that parts are available before dispatching a job.
How do you like to receive in FMT critical documents together with other site/equipment/job related information
Which function of FMS you expect most
Which function of FMS you have more concern
Please share your comments or story with colleagues
